name: Anamorphine
description: Explore the past as you resolve the present in Anamorphine, a surreal adventure of rendered emotions. Journey into the mind of the main character, a young man in denial. His subconscious is pushing him to face his past - or be consumed by it. Play on a screen or in VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 2GB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10375 MB available space
